Package org.soulwing.prospecto.api.listener

View node listener API

When generating a view or applying a view to update a model, several types of listeners can be use to allow application code to observe and/or manipulate the process. All listeners implement the ViewListener marker interface and are registered with the context by retrieving the view context's listener collection (using ViewContext.getListeners()) and appending or prepending listener instances as appropriate to the needs of the application.

See the various listener subtypes in the package for a description of when and under what conditions a listener of that type is invoked during the view processing lifecycle.

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ViewEvent
    A marker that identifies an event for a ViewListener.
    ViewListener
    Marker interface that identifies a listener type.
    ViewListeners
    A mutable ordered collection of ViewListener instances.
    ViewNodeAcceptor
    A listener that is notified before nodes are visited during a view processing lifecycle.
    ViewNodeEntityListener
    A listener that is notified as instances of model types are created or discarded during view application.
    ViewNodeListener
    An listener that is notified as nodes are visited during view generation or view application.
    ViewNodePropertyInterceptor
    An interceptor that is notified as property values are visited during view generation or view application.
    ViewNodePropertyListener
    An listener that is notified as properties are visited during view generation or view application.
    ViewPostTraversalListener
    A listener that is notified after a view template is traversed to generate or apply a view.
    ViewPreTraversalListener
    A listener that is notified before a view template is traversed to generate or apply a view.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ViewNodeEvent
    An event about a view node.
    ViewNodePropertyEvent
    An event that describes a property of a view node.
    ViewTraversalEvent
    An event that describes a view traversal.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ViewMode
    An enumeration of modes in which a view is processed.
